introduction: Creating new food flavours involves skill and can be a bit of a mystery. In this programme Neil and

vocabulary.definition: scientists who combine different natural and artificial ingredients to create flavors
vocabulary.example: The flavourists at the company work tirelessly to develop unique and delicious ice cream flavors.

vocabulary.definition: the period of time an apprentice spends working with a skilled master to learn their skills
vocabulary.example: She completed her apprenticeship under a renowned pastry chef to perfect her baking skills.

vocabulary.definition: an organization of people who do the same job or have the same interests
vocabulary.example: The guild of artists held regular meetings to discuss new techniques and share their artwork.

vocabulary.definition: happening or acquired while at work or on the job
vocabulary.example: The company provides on-the-job training for new employees to ensure they learn practical skills.

vocabulary.definition: a method of achieving something in a clever but dishonest or wicked way
vocabulary.example: Some people view hacking as a dark art due to the secretive and deceptive nature of the practice.

vocabulary.definition: a person doing skilled work with their hands
vocabulary.example: The artisan baker crafted each loaf of bread with precision and care, resulting in exceptional quality.
